Room.Name: Second Floor Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the second floor of the great Kista Towers building.
Room.LongDescription: To the north, there is a large opening below you, allowing you to see the grand throne room with two large, golden thrones in it. There doesn't seem to be anyone in the throne room right now. The hallway continues to the east and west. There is a green-painted door to the south.
